children.text: Fire & Ice Facial in Pune - Hollywood’s Red-Carpet Facial, Now at The Skin Firm
What Is a Fire & Ice Facial?

is a medical-grade treatment designed to instantly resurface the skin, reduce fine lines, clear blemishes and deliver a radiant glow all with zero downtime.

This two-step treatment uses a combination of an intensive resurfacing mask (the Fire) and a cooling, rejuvenating mask (the Ice). Together, they safely exfoliate, hydrate, and refresh the skin, making it the go-to facial for celebrities before big events.

At
we bring this luxurious yet medically effective treatment to you, tailored to your skin’s needs for maximum results.
Signs & Skin Concerns a Fire & Ice Facial Can Address
Uneven skin tone or rough texture
Why Choose Fire & Ice Facial at The Skin Firm?
Do you want instantly radiant skin without downtime? The Fire & Ice Facial at The Skin Firm, Pune is the perfect choice. Unlike regular salon facials, this treatment is
and medical-grade, ensuring both safety and visible results.
At The Skin Firm, our Fire & Ice Facials are:\n\n>
- under the guidance of Skin Specialist Dr. Karishma Singh\n\n>
- far more effective than basic facials\n\n>
- tailored for acne-prone, sensitive, or ageing skin\n\n>
- delivers instant glow and long-term skin benefits
How Our Fire & Ice Facial Works
We begin with a gentle cleanse and assessment of your skin.
A powerful mask with glycolic acid, retinol, and niacinamide is applied to exfoliate dead cells, unclog pores, and resurface the skin.
A cooling, hydrating mask with aloe vera, hyaluronic acid, and green tea soothes and refreshes, restoring balance and radiance.
Dermatologist-approved serums, moisturisers, and SPF are applied to lock in results.
Types of Fire & Ice Facial Treatments We Offer in Pune
focuses on fine lines and early wrinkles

Reduces fine lines and early wrinkles

Safe and effective for all skin types

Men & women looking for instant glow and hydration
Brides & grooms preparing for their big day
Adults with fine lines, dullness, or mild acne scars
Safe for all skin tones and types
